alert.note: Alert for Independence; Jackson; Lawrence; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:39AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Independence, southeastern Randolph, northeastern Jackson, Lawrence and southeastern Sharp Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 339 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Annieville to near Moorefield. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... Cave City... Tuckerman... Swifton... College City... Portia... Grubbs... Strawberry... Lynn... Alicia... Minturn... Annieville... Sedgwick... Smithville... Powhatan... Aetna... Charlotte... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
